page.title: 03HEWEGREEN FARM STUDY,ASTLEY
page.content: Hewegreen Farm is jointly owned by Mrs Meusel and her brother Peter Turner.They have 30 acres of permanent and mixed pasture.17 acres are used as pasture and 13 acres are used for hay making.They have 20 beef cattle,22 milk cattle,11 geese,a number of goats 13 chickens,17 sheep,and 26 lambs.They own a tractor,bailer,mower,roll,tether pick up truck,welder,chainsaw,bail grabber,bail sledge,and weed sprayer. Mr Turner and his son work full time while his younger son helps part time. Mr Turner has been at Hewegreen Farm for 20 years.Over the last 10 years he has not seen many changes. Mrs Meusel owns a winter store for the beasts,a store for equipment,an old hen pen,a large split level barn,a Dutch barn,hay storage and the farmhouse itself. {
